subject: Football (College)
Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Ryan Flaherty, a strength and conditioning coach, runs a California camp that helps former college players shave precious fractions of a second off their 40-yard dash times.
snippet: Ryan Flaherty, a strength and conditioning coach, runs a California camp that helps former college players shave precious fractions of a second off their 40-yard dash times.
